org.apache.hive.storage.jdbc.dao

Class GenericJdbcDatabaseAccessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hive.storage.jdbc.dao.GenericJdbcDatabaseAccessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatabaseAccessor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JethroDatabaseAccessor, MsSqlDatabaseAccessor, MySqlDatabaseAccessor, OracleDatabaseAccessor, PostgresDatabaseAccessor

    public class GenericJdbcDatabaseAccessor
extends Object
implements DatabaseAccessor
    A data accessor that should in theory work with all JDBC compliant database drivers.
